text: Celebrities attend fashion prom, aka the 2018 Met Gala, in their interpretation of this year's theme, Heavenly Bodies: Fashion and the Catholic Imagination. The exhibit focuses on religious iconography and influence in fashion. Here, what everyone is wearing, from Blake Lively to Amal Clooney.
title: See All the Looks from the 2018 Met Gala

og.description: What everyone is wearing for fashion's biggest night of the year.
